transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Ha boliye.
Customer: Hello. Ha sir, good evening. Good evening sir, aapne business vagera baat kare the na.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Sir, maine service ke liye aapko connect kiya tha, this person hai yehi. Baat kari maine lekin sir dekho maine aapko pehle bhi bataya tha vahi same cheez aani chahiye hai ki aap kam se kam is service fees ka jo bhi hai hum aapko pura proper support karenge. Aap ispe work karoge toh isme. Kyunki service hai aapki nayi, aap bhi jaante ho, isme thoda time lagta hi hai. Catalog ko build up mein, ye vali cheez hai.
Executive: Ab bas ye hai ki apni taraf se thoda sa aur improvement karna padega. Products mein, photos mein.
Customer: Kya karna padega usme?
Executive: Thoda sa improvement aur humne apan ko karna padega, thoda sa aur important cheeze mention kar dete hain isme. Aise toh main catalog mein saari cheeze add kar chuki hu, lagbhag lagbhag. Thodi bahut cheeze reh gayi hai toh main vo bhi kar dungi, jaise ki photo aap badalva rahe honge, ye aapka X-Lock Connect ka, Paracetamol ka kaam karta. Aur ek do photo toh maine bole the aapko vo aap change kara le product ke. Baaki as such aur koi issue vali cheez hai nahi sir. Aap isko use karo, zyadatar call aapko aayenge, unhi se aapke deal conversion ho paati hai. Aap usme follow vaise bhi kar hi rahe ho, calls aapko aa hi rahe hain. But retail ki call aapko zyada aa rahi hai, call entertain karna padegi sir, aaram se deal conversion hoga, bas thoda slow hota hai service mein. Ye vali cheez hai.
Executive: Kyunki aapka product achcha, achcha competition mein hai, aisa nahi hai ki koi local product aap kaam kar rahe hain. Is tarah mein logo aur bhi kaam kar rahe hain. Ye competition hai is vajah se aisa ho raha hai. Thoda sa.
Customer: Kya hua refund ke bare mein?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Maine refund ke bare mein jo bola tha kya hua uske bare mein?
Executive: Dekhiye sir, aapne investment kara toh uske return ke liye kiya hai. Ab starting mein jo hum sab aapko ho raha hai service ka cheezon ka aapko aapko pata hai ki aage benefit mil sakta hai. Work karke aur aap din mein 15-20 leads ka bhi aapka tak nahi hai. Ab agar aap vo bhi nahi karoge toh sir aise kaise business mil payega, aap batao. Business ki kya expectation hai aapka aur toh kuch hai nahi. Hai na?
Customer: Call karne ka kya fayda hai?
Executive: Sir, dekho aap jis cheez keh rahe ho na, us cheez ke liye main bhi samajh rahi hu. Thik hai? Lekin jab main jaanti hu aur main vahi aapko cheeze samjhana chah rahi hu kyunki is product line mein aur bhi customer handle karte hain. Jinko aaram se business aa raha hai but isme thoda work karna padega. Agar aap aap sochoge ki kaam na karna pade aur phir aapko business mil jaye toh aisa toh nahi hoga. Long term mein business milega. Kya work karna padega bataiye?
Executive: Dekho buylead aap pehle se use kar rahe ho. Aap buylead continue rakho, isse aapka call flow vaise bhi badh ke aa raha hai sir. Aapko har hafte ke 10-10 call aa rahe hain. Aap socho agar aapka do mahine, teen mahine mein bhi sirf ek deal hogi ya saal bhar mein bhi teen ya teen deal, char deal hogi toh bhi aaram se paise recover ho jayenge aapke. Baaki aapka promotion hai aapne. Sir vo bhi sir first year hai aur aapka initially service start hui hai toh thoda time lag jata hai. Aapke catalog se ki dikhta hai customer kitna purana hai. Char mahine pehle hai, four months pehle hai.
Customer: Are yaar rakho yaar, phir vahi baat purani baat repeat, purani vali baat.
Executive: Suno sir, aap ek baar meri baat toh suno. Main aapko kya keh rahi hu. Maine aapko WhatsApp pe photo bhi maange hai product ke, aap mujhe vo photo do, main kam se kam vo toh add kar du. Jo mujhe sahi lag rahe hain toh main change kar sakti hu. Thode se aur clear kar du. Cheezon ko main aur mention kar du. ho gaya, phir aap photo-voto maang ke kya kar rahi ho?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Maine aapse kaha tha maine business band kar diya hai, phir aap dimag kharab kar rahi ho mera baar baar.
Executive: Ye toh sir main bhi jaanti hu, aap bhi jaante ho business band vali baat nahi hai. Aap toh overall hamesha aap yehi kehte hain cheezon ka ki aapko business nahi mila is vajah se aap keh rahe hain sir. Right?
Customer: Aise baat nahi hai.
Executive: Baaki rest sahi cheezon ki baat toh aap thoda sa catalog mein bhi main cheeze thodi add kara deti hu. Thodi photo mujhe aur de do. Aapke shop ke photo dale hue hain, thodi aur cheeze add karenge, product add karenge toh aapko usme ho sakta milega sir. Ye vali cheeze hain. Aap buylead toh already use kar hi rahe hain, usse aapki visibility improve hui hai. Aapki preference cities jo hai vo ban gayi hai. Aapke preference city mein dekho Patna hai, Purnia hai, Bhagalpur hai, Mumbai hai, Kishanganj hai, Lucknow hai. Thik hai? Aapka Sahara, Ranchi, ye sab aapki prefer location set hui hai. Preference location bina aise hi thodi set ho jati hain. Same aapki category bhi hai vo bhi prefer set hui hai, vo bhi aise hi set nahi ho jati. Vo aapne buylead li hai tabhi toh set hui hai aur ye call aap jo soch rahe hain aapko mahine ki achchi call aa rahi hain. Vo bhi catalog naya bana hai toh kaise aa ja rahi hain? Kyunki aap istemal kar rahe hain is vajah se aa rahi hain sir. Keyword aapke highlight hue hain.
Customer: Agar main business band kar diya toh?
Executive: Sun, dekho sir, mera jo kaam hai na vo bas cheeze aapko importance batane ka hai. Ki ye itni importance hai, abhi step hai aage ka ki aap isme achcha conversation bhi aur achchi importance bhi de sakte hain kyunki dekho agar catalog nahi dikh raha hota. Kisi ko nahi nazar aa raha hota, aapki service, aapki visibility hoti nahi toh log aapko bhale hi ek cheez ke liye kare, 100 cheez ke liye kare, aapko call kaise aata? Nahi aa pata na? Agar vo cheez kahi dikhai nahi de IndiaMART ko. Kahi na kahi dikh raha hai tabhi toh aapko hafte ke 10 call aur mahine ke 80-50 call aa ja rahe hain. Bas sirf itni cheez hai ki sir calls aapko retail bhi aa rahi hain, bulk ki bhi aa rahi hain. Unko apan ko entertain karna padega tabhi vo deal close ho payenge. Ye vali cheez hai. Main jaanti hu aapko retail call zyada aa rahi hongi, ho sakta hai. Uske liye maine aapka minimum jo order quantity cheeze hoti hain product mein maine vo dal di hain. Taki jo bhi customer hai dekhe toh dekh ke jo bhi check kar pa rahe hain ki banda minimum itne mein kaam karta hai toh vo dekh ke kare, koi bhi requirement dale. Main toh khud jaanti hu sir aap kya dikkat face kar rahe ho uske liye maine khud hi step liya hua hai already.
Executive: Aap thoda sa dekho sir, business milega itna achcha aage aapko sir. Kyunki aap aise continue rakhoge, investment karoge tab aapko milega isme services mein. Ye vali cheez rehti hai hamesha. Agar nahi hoti toh main aapko nahi bolti sir in cheezon ke liye continuously. Aap bhi main bhi jaanti hu aap mujhe kya keh rahe hain. Aur mujhe bhi pata hai iske bare mein.
Customer: Thik hai rakhiye magar.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Rakho yaar.
Executive: Sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer complains about receiving too many retail calls.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of continuing the subscription.

- Executive mentioned adding minimum order quantity to products.

- Executive asked the customer to provide updated product photos.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to continue with the subscription.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, catalog, retail calls
